item.title: My Cool friends
item.description:
Introduction

Hi everyone, during my little journey in Infosec i meet awesome guys who help me, learn me and with i work when we have time.

  • Roland Hack : A young and incredible Bug Hunter, web lovers, and it’s also pop a vuln after a cup of coffee with milk.
  • Top0n3 : Also Bug hunter at Hackerone, pwner and reverser, he break mobile and web application.
  • Hadrien : A incredible pentester guys, but it’s technically impacting, bug hunter coming soon.
  • Laluka : Black Cat ? In-depth knowledge of many topics- man, bypass-url-parser and skillarch dude, check her youtube channel
